name: Ceres
description:
▶ Stunning View in high quality 3D graphic!
Experience uncompairable visual of Heroes
with high quality 3D graphic you have never seen before!

▶ Ultimate skill with 3D Cinematic View!
Enjoy stylish battle
With ultimate skills in 3D Cinematic View

▶ Strategy Mode to change the game!
Enough with the Auto battle! Forget the battle so far!
Enjoy real time battles with Strategy Mode!

▶ Irresistible Contents!
PVP, Raid, Sky Tower, Dragon Tower, Elemental Dungeon, etc.
